product_metadata.plan_type: Non-Linked, Non-Participating, Individual Life Insurance Term Plan

product_summary.objective: Bajaj Life iSecure II is a term insurance plan designed to secure your family's financial future through life protection, flexible death benefit payouts, optional return of premium variant, and additional wellness benefits.
key_highlights: Choice of 3 plan variants: Life, ROP, Easy
Flexible death benefit payout: lump sum, instalments, or combination
Option to get back Total Premiums Paid under ROP variant
Early Exit Value option under Life variant
Auto Cover Continuance Benefit allows premium deferral up to 12 months
Health Management Services wellness benefit included

features: Maturity Benefit = Total Premiums Paid returned
Option for maturity payout in yearly instalments over 5 years
Surrender Value and Policy Loan available

core_benefits.details: Sum Assured on Death is payable as lump sum. Death benefit will not be less than Guaranteed Death Benefit = 105% of Total Premiums Paid till death.
payout_options: Combination (10%–90% lump sum + balance monthly income)

core_benefits.details: Total Premiums Paid is returned on maturity. Option to take maturity benefit in yearly instalments over 5 years.
Minimum payout is always 105% of premiums paid till date.

exercise_conditions: Can be exercised after attaining age 60 within first 5 policy years

auto_cover_continuance_benefit.benefit: Premiums can be deferred up to 12 months while maintaining full cover
conditions: Gap of 5 years required between uses
Not available in last premium payment year

Bajaj Life New Critical Illness Benefit Rider

health_management_services.note: Wellness services available subject to paying premiums on time.

retrieval_chunks.text: iSecure II offers three variants: Life, Return of Premium (ROP), and Easy variant.
Death benefit is paid as lump sum or monthly income. Minimum guaranteed payout is 105% of premiums paid.
Under ROP variant, Total Premiums Paid is returned at maturity, with option of instalments over 5 years.
Life variant provides Early Exit Value equal to 100% of Total Premiums Paid after age 60, subject to conditions.
Premiums can be deferred up to 12 months while keeping full cover active, available in Life and ROP variants.
Optional riders include Accidental Death Benefit, Disability Rider, Family Protect Rider, and Critical Illness Rider.
